00014 Lexicon::Lexicon(string lang)
00015 {
00016         language = lang;
00017         i = 0; //number of inserted words

00028 unsigned int Lexicon::insert(string word)
00029 {
00030         pair<map<string,unsigned int>::iterator, bool> temp = str2int.insert(pair<string,unsigned int> (word,i));
00031         if(temp.second) //has word alredy been inserted?
00032         {
00033                 if (i >= int2str.size())
00034                 {
00035                         int2str.resize(int2str.size() + VECTOR_RESIZE);
00036                 }
00037 
00038                 // word has been inserted
00039                 int2str[i] = word;
00040                 i++;
00041                 return (i-1);
00042         }
00043         else
00044         {
00045                 // word is already saved
00046                 return (*temp.first).second;
00047         }
00048 }
00055 string Lexicon::getWord(unsigned int value)
00056 {
00057         if (value >= int2str.size())
00058                 return "?";
00059         string re = int2str[value];
00060         return re;
00061 }

00070 unsigned int Lexicon::getNum(string word)
00071 {
00072         return (str2int.find(word))->second;
00073 }
